app.about_body_a: Hallacoin is a cryptocurrency developed by the
app.about_body_b: -Discord server. Hallacoin doesn't have a practical market-value at the moment. It can still be used like any conventional cryptocurrency when needed.

app.about_paytowin_2a: You can buy these by sending a payment to the address
